mapper.select: SELECT `teacher`.`id`, `teacher`.`realname`, `user`.`id` AS `user.id`, `user`.`nickname` AS `user.nickname` FROM `t_teacher` AS `teacher` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `t_user` AS user WHERE user.del_flag = FALSE ) AS `user` ON `user`.`id` = `teacher`.`user_id` WHERE `teacher`.`del_flag` = FALSE AND (`user`.`id` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{_parameter},'%') OR `teacher`.`realname` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{_parameter},'%'))

SELECT `teacher`.`id`, `teacher`.`realname`, `user`.`id` AS `user.id`, `user`.`nickname` AS `user.nickname` FROM `t_teacher` AS `teacher` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `t_user` AS user WHERE user.del_flag = FALSE ) AS `user` ON `user`.`id` = `teacher`.`user_id` WHERE `teacher`.`del_flag` = FALSE ORDER BY `teacher`.`create_time` DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_teacher AS teacher WHERE teacher.del_flag = FALSE AND teacher.user_id = #{_parameter}
